pr_title: BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API

timeline.message: BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API
BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API

timeline.bodyText: Illustrating these functions with unit tests would be preferable. This means you probably don't want to use Random. But you can add up the numbers 0, 1 & 2 from IntStream.range
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

replies.bodyText: I moved the code to a unit test class
replies.author: fabripautasso

timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
